item.title: Florida Highway Patrol wins third consecutive ‘best-looking’ cruiser contest
item.description: Florida continues to dominate the competition, but this isn’t about Gators’ sports.

Governor DeSantis speaking at New College of Florida
item.description: Governor DeSantis is speaking live at New College of Florida in Sarasota.

item.title: Fruitville Road in Sarasota reopened after serious crash
item.description: The Florida Department of Transportation is reporting a motor vehicle accident on Fruitville Road in Sarasota.

item.title: Gas prices continue to fall in Florida, AAA says
item.description: On Sunday, the average price for a gallon of regular unleaded in Florida was $2.94 per gallon.

item.title: Flesh eating bacteria kills 4 people in Florida so far in 2025
item.description: The Florida Department of Health (FDOH) is reporting that four people in Florida have died from a flesh eating so far in 2025.

item.title: Police opening investigation after boat fire at Twin Dolphin Marina
item.description: The Bradenton Police Department said reports of a fire next to Green Bridge were received around 1:30 p.m. on Monday

item.title: I-75 off-ramp closure might delay traffic
item.description: Drivers may be delayed seeking alternate for I-75 ramp closure.

item.title: Manatee County wants public input on future of planned Cortez boat ramp
item.description: Cortez Boat Ramp location expected to be north of Cortez Bridge

item.title: Tropical system to bring some heavy rain
item.description: A potential tropical system is likely to move across Florida on Tuesday bringing a good chance for some heavy rain.

item.title: WATCH: Coast Guard airlifts fisherman from boat 130 miles off Sanibel
item.description: The owner of the Honey Bee, a commercial fishing vessel, reported the captain was experiencing a medical emergency.
